title: Process a Ticket Refund for a Canceled Event
description: An event has been canceled, and a ticket holder is requesting a full refund.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's order using their order number or email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the original ticket purchase.

tasks.description: Verify that the event was officially canceled and that the ticket is eligible for a refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the event cancellation and ticket eligibility.

tasks.description: Process a full refund to the original payment method.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the refund transaction.

tasks.description: Send a confirmation email to the customer showing the refund has been processed.
